content.detailedDescription: I was leaving home when something to the west caught my eye. i stopped my car at the end of the driveway and saw a larger star-like object that was further down than the rest of the stars. i could see atleast six other objects of light going around it, then disappearing further off into the distance. i ran inside to get the camcorder and when i came out i could still see the main object. i caught three other flashes of lights coming towards it then quickly disappear. the last object, however, went towards the main object and got level with it and was flashing red, blue and white, it then went up and to the left and they both disappeared and i didn't see them again after that. i was so scared (and cold) that it was hard for me to keep the camera still. in the beginning of the video it appears that the object moved, but it was me moving the camera up to see if i could see the stars.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I travel for a living and my route takes me down i287.  for a couple of weeks around my taking this picture i had noticed numerous sightings but wasn't (freaked out and didn't think of it until later) able to get a picture until the day in question.  i didn't remember the exact day.

(on a previous encounter i had a hooded "person" outside my bedroom window that i reported previously i think)  about two or three weeks later after seeing the clay county event i had something happen while i was asleep.  it happened on three occasions and i had an awareness of more recently. (remembrance)

1.  i have two small dogs.  the first "dream" i had i saw my dog (5 lb. one) being drug around viciously by a tomcat and i was shocked and couldn't help her because she was too far away. (fast in & out dream)

2.  second "dream" i see the dog (5 lb. one) closer to me and being attacked by two tomcats and i couldn't separate them so i balled up my fist and raised it up to hit the cat.  (fast in & out dream)

3.  third "dream" my first recollection is being in a state of paralysis and floating through the air with a group of beings, one was an older asian man with a dark jacket (maybe a military garb?).  we moved with one accord and i noticed i was dressed very royally.  we sat at a round table (like a coffee table) and couches like a pit group.  i remember looking (transfixed) at the asian man and i thought we were going to have tea when my smaller (3 lb.) dog was placed in my lap and a knife was placed in my hand.  i instinctively knew to do an operation which i started and then noticed that it wasn't going right and freaked out.  at that point i got up and started walking away and noticed a large what i thought at the time was a dog like figure walking around "talking" to me.  i remember "telling" him as they brought my dog to another room, please don't kill her as they related that they would take care of it from there.  the large figure had a very narrow face like a doberman but i now believe it to be a reptilian because i noticed a space between the back like a hole which i believe now was the tail lifted as it walks.  it came up to me to take the knife which i was terrified and i gave it the knife.

after that i was shown by another creature which i can't describe how to navigate or move from upper level to lower level within the craft.  i was shown how to go off the edge of it and down to a lower level and the creature went with me and we chatted (very friendly).  when i was asked to do it myself, i couldn't a. it is not intuitive to me to walk off the edge of one area of a height for any reason even if i was just shown this b. one minor thought was that my shoes would come off and i was shown a pair of shoes on me that i wore 30 years ago that strapped around my leg, (and c. why was i being asked to go there? (very fast, after this - was out of the "dream"). with no explanation.

i don't believe it was a dream due to the nature of this and the fact that i am a very lucid dreamer.  i had nothing going on in my life to indicate a concern about my dogs and stray cats as they are either with me or at home with a dog door that only lets them in and the 3 lb. one thinks she is a doberman and lunges at anything that moves and the 5 lb. one i think wouldn't go without a fight.  also, after this happened about a week ago i wanted very much to remember more about how this happened because i don't like being taken either physically or mentally anywhere for experiments of any kind and remembered my head being pinned down from behind and carefully lifted up by something that was very afraid of me, seems like i opened my eyes momentarily.

also, one a side note, i have a poster print of some art i saw at the kimball in fort worth, tx. and the figures are dressed very royally.

1.(dog picture is the size of my dogs)
2. (picture hard to see but i blew it up on corel and it looks like some of the images are beyond the ufo image.  my husband says it looks like the space station above it) i can send directly from my iphone if i have an email address, thanks.
content.summary: Took a picture on my iphone, can send to you if i have an email address

content.detailedDescription:
At around 6pm (18:00 hours) i was outside in the backyard of my home with my canon eos rebel xt digital camera taking photographs of nature and the natural landscape.  at around the same time i noticed a small helium balloon (such as a party balloon) floating by up in the sky and decided to take a few pictures of it just on a whim.  after i shot the first picture of the balloon i noticed (through the view finder) a small white object moving rapidly from left to right within the view finder.  i quickly tried to take a second photograph of the object but was unable to as it vanished before i could focus on it accurately.  
however, when i came upstairs and uploaded all of the images i had taken into my computer i noticed that the second picture i took of the helium balloon had the strange white object within its frame.  i couldn���t help (and still can���t help) but wonder what the object could have been, as it flew very quickly and completely silently before it disappeared.  the sky was also very clear and there was no other air traffic that i could see within my vicinity.
the photograph of the object was taken with the following settings:
shutter speed:  1/320 sec.
aperture: f6.3
iso speed: 100
lens:  75-300mm
focal length: 300mm
i took the photo and simply increased the contrast on it so you could see the object a little brighter, however i will make sure to email both the original untouched picture as well as the contrast enhanced version.  i hope you folks can figure out what this is because i certainly have no clue as i have never seen an object of this shape in flight.
content.summary: Small white oval object moving n.E. in picture.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched the object slowly move over salisbury reservation heading toward my general direction. it was very bright an glowed an orange color. at first i thought maybe it was a jet afterburner, then i noticed it was moving to slow for a jet in afterburner.
as i watched rise and move south ,it all of a sudden moved away at a very
high speed.First it was here then it was far away then gone.I live at the beach and see all kinds of aircraft, in fact there is a small airport 
a mile from my house,i have never seen anything move like that
in my life.I can't say for sure it was a u.F.O. but i have never, i
repeat never seen anything like that before.Before god almighty. 


i went out to smoke a cigarette.
thats when i noticed the brigtness the orange glowing oval shape.
no nav. lights. no strobe lightshow i felt was curous then alittle stunned.I didn't so much move it was more like floating.
i lost sight of the object when it just rapidly flew away.
content.summary: Orange colored, glowing very bright, no sound, moved very slow then moved away very very fast

content.detailedDescription: About 1995 at 0500 or so i was on my way to work. once i had left the city and entered the country i noticed an object which because of its size and forward speed i thought it may have been a blimp. leaving in eastern north carolina i am used to seeing military aircraft of all types and at this time i was quite an aviation buff i knew this was not a military aircraft.  i continued traveling and our paths crossed.  i was  early that morning so i was able to pull my truck over, turn it off and watch the object pass directly over me at which time i saw that it was delta shaped.  it was totally silent and it had no lights internally or externally.  it was hard to approximate its altitude, it was very large but did not totally blot out the stars.  once the craft passed over and continued out of my sight i heard jet aircraft approaching form the sw and i thought someone else must be interested in this too.  stranger than seeing this is how it made feel.  i really felt nothing at all and i don't think i told a soul until now.  even now i find it strange that i never mentioned it to anyone.
content.summary: On my way to work i noticed the object  intermediately approaching from the sw and our paths crossed.

content.detailedDescription: At approximatley 7:50 p.M. i was traveling north bound on west lake houston parkway in kingwood, texas (about 30 miles northeast of houston, texas).  it was dark, overcast, and had been raining throughout the day.  while approaching a stop light i suddenly saw a green light flash across the sky to the north of us.  it was not lightening and in some ways it ressembeled the aurora lights in that it lingered for a second and seemed to wave in the sky.  as soon as the flash of light happened the stop light that we were appraoching started flashing red extremely quickly, much faster than a normal flashing red traffic signal. i asked my wife if she saw it and she stated that she did not.  the light turned green and as we proceeded forward there was another flash of light up in the sky, this time it was orangeish in color.  other than the color the light had the same qualities as the first flash and once again the stop light began flashing quickly.  on this second occasion both my wife and i and our 6 year old daughter witnessed the flash.  my wife and i agreed that it was unlike anything we had ever seen.  has anyone else reported this?
content.summary: Two quick colored flashes in the sky above  kingwood, texas

content.detailedDescription: My wife, sister-in-law and i were returning home from madison, wi. we had just left iron mountain and were heading north on rt. 95. my wife was in the back seat sleeping, her sister was driving and i was in the rt. passenger seat,when i noticed four lights above the rt.Tree line.Oooo  i brought them to the attention of my sister-in-law.  they appeared to be coming from the northeast towards us.  i first thought the objects might be connected to one of the towers in the area.  but i had never seen lights like that on any of the towers that are near rt. 95 to rt 41.Approx. 45 mi. stretch.The lights stood out in the dark night.  as we watched them get closer to the car the four lights changed into two cresent moons facing each other..( )    we lost sight of the objects when they passed over the vehicle. we knew we had seen something very strange.  i have traveled that road the last 22 years and never saw anything like that.During the next two months i traveled the road both in daylight and dark and saw there wasn't a tower in the area let alone white lights.  the towers that have lights, have red lights. we heard no noise from the lights and they we not very bright. just about what a full moon would look like.  after it passed over our car i was sorry we didn't stop the car to see if we could see more.  the real kicker was when four went to two and very different shapes. sorry about crescent but i am new on the computer and don't want to lose page.
content.summary: They looked like four silver dollars aside one another.

content.detailedDescription:
I wrote this email to the newsdesk in rte (irish national tv broadcaster). this will explain. i got no reply. i also reported it to a ufo society here in ireland. they tried contacting rte but they also got no reply.

i've attached a photo i took of my tv in pause mode as a time and visual reference for rte.

heres the email i sent to rte...

from	xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
to	newsonline@rte.Ie,
newsdesk@rte.Ie
date	5 december 2008 21:33
subject	i saw a ufo on tonights six one news - in the footage
mailed-by	gmail.Com
	
hide details 05/12/2008
	
hi

i had recorded tonights 6-1 news on my sky digital and i  noticed there was a ufo in the footage. having looked at it a few times i can't figure out what it is but it does make a strange sharp manoeuvre.
where you can find it ....

14 minutes into the news there is a report by george lee about oil prices

'oil prices slumped below $40 this afternoon the lowest for 4 years, and more than $100 below the peak of last july'

at the same time of the blue writing, if you look at the middle of the screen and move 3/4 of the way to the left you will see this strange object floating around !

not sure what you should do with it but you guys should be able to zoom in and perhaps get a better look.

keep me updated please!

regards,

greg
content.summary: I saw it on the main evening news on tv

content.detailedDescription: Saw object following 4 engine plane , at 10 oclock postion on the horizon, object was disrubting the com trail behind plane. this is what made me aware of it. object looked to be 4 times larger han plane. object conntinued to follow plane for about 10 minutes, then slowly pulled beside plane, then left at high rate of speed. 2 other people wittness this event.
content.summary: Saw object following 4 engine plane

content.detailedDescription: Circle ufo comes from south,low altitude,looks from groung as big as football..Weather is cloude no stars in sight..Object gos to north,then makes 90 degrees angle to east..And goes then back to the south..
content.summary: Multiple lightning circle object

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on anderson lane to meet a friend when i noticed a bright point of green light in the sky traveling in a straight line at a steady pace from south to north. i assumed it was an aircraft at cruising altitude, but there were no flashing lights as i would expect(and i'm not familiar with intense green lights on a plane). also, while not moving at blazing speed, it was much faster than aircraft i've seen, covering several degrees of the sky in about ten seconds. i then lost my view of it through my windshield as it was far above my car. within thirty seconds i had pulled into a parking lot, got out to find it again, but it was gone.
  when i got home several hours later, i googled "green light in sky", found several similar sightings, but no explanations.
content.summary: Bright green light travelling across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front poarch smoking when i observed two lights at an unknown altidude moving from the nw traveling se. i was looking at what i thought was 2 airplanes or something then suddenly it split off into 4 lights while still heading s.E. about 10 seconds latter it again split into what looked like 8 lights and seconds latter it split into a dozen or so lights and at this point seemed to change direction and looked like it was moving toward the south at this point i lost sight of the objects behind some trees in my neighbors yard.I would like to add that there was cloud cover and i observed all of this below the clouds.
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: I went to pick up the sunday papers for delivery earlier tonight and the truck was late so i do like i usually do and look at the sky it took only a few seconds before i noticed a white light in the distant atmosphere it took a second for my eyes to ajust that far but as they did i noticed it was to lights spacing a wide dark silver rectangle shaped object i followed that till i lost sight in the backgaze of the moon...So i gave up on that and started looking around again then something caught my eye..Right above me at about 300 - 400 ft there where 4 white orbs flying in a traingle formation 3 on the right in a diagonal line with the fourth in the bottom left n they made no noise yet going extremely quick i tracked them as they passed through the lil dipper constolation and quickly traveled out of sight within about 7 seconds ...In all honesty this was one the craziest things ive seen in all my years of staring at the stars
content.summary: Saw rectangle formation prompted by orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My boy friend and i go outside to smoke. on the porch 2 nights ago i noticed a blinking light in the sky that resembled a star. the difference is that the lights change colors. this is the third night that we saw the light. it stays in the same position. air traffic flies by, but it stays stationary. we got the binoculars out and you can see the lights, blue, red, maybe green also. its above the 29 palms base. if you have someone in the area, look now and you will see it. three days and counting. no pictures.
content.summary: This objectis in the north eastern sky has been the for the last three nights that we know of

content.detailedDescription:
Im not the witness im a referral im not sure  if this woman has been in contact with you guys so i feel obligated to report this womans video footage from may 09' up till recent days..At http://www.Youtube.Com/user/seeingufospa

she has over 60 videos of incredible up close footage of morphing triangular crafts with lights, spheres or orbs and i felt since this is an ongoing scenario, perhaps an investigation or interview could be fascilitated for the show or whatnot.. exact locations are given on her page. she has stills and lengthy footage it is a must inlook. ty. please respond unto further action.
content.summary: Up close extravagant footage of multiple triangular morping craft and other

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, and at about 12:15 am est, i came to a stop at a red light in easton, ma (washington street cvs) and the lights immediately caught my eye. i do live near a small airport, and thought it was a plane at first, until the lights started moving sideways, back and forth. this lasted about 14 seconds until the light turned green and i was too frightened and wanted to get home as quick as possible. i had to turn left, and then looked again for the lights as i turned again, but did not see them.
content.summary: Three equal-spaced lights (as one) at a 45 degree angle moving back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to have a smoke it was shortly after dark. i caught a glimpse of something strange looked up to find something i cannot explain. it was a dark grey boomerang wing shape moving totally silently no visible lights moving from north to south it was directly above my location visible for about a minute it was moving slowly about the speed of a small plane but much larger i estimate it to be about 100 to 200 ft long could not really tell the height at which it was flying . it was such a dark color it was not visible very long as it was dark outside. thought it could have been a flock of high flying birds in a v shape until i google'd what i had seen and found other similar sightings...
content.summary: Dark grey wing shape moving silently no lights

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home after work at about 9:00 pm. i saw 3 bright white lights to the east off of rip rap rd just west of were it crosses fishburg rd. they were not airplane lights. nor were they any sort of tower lights. i delayed posting this sighting because i wanted to make sure what i saw wasn't explainable. i know it's not much but maybe someone else saw it.
content.summary: Bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
At around 11:30 pm on the night of october 7, 2009, i walked into the front room of our house to make sure the door was locked, and saw out of our large window a bright orange ball of light in the north-eastern sky. through the window, it was slightly obscured by tree branches. even so, i thought i could see it moving, and thought it might be some kind of ufo. i promptly put on my shoes and jacket and went out into our front yard to see what it was. i walked out of our front yard into the street. to my front was a bean field, and behind me was my front yard, which is full of large trees so i could not see any of the western sky. 

the light was no longer there, but in front of me to the north-east i saw an object that looked almost like a star. it was moving slowly towards the west. it moved much too slowly to be a plane (there are two small airports a few miles east and west of where i live, so i have seen airplanes nearly everyday for my whole life, and i know what they look like). as i watched it move from north-east to more in the northern sky, i saw it rise quickly (compared to how slowly it was moving) in a manner that would have been impossible for a plane. it eventually disappeared behind clouds in the northern sky.

as i watched this light, i noticed two more. one was not too far from the first star-like light i just mentioned, but it disappeared much sooner than the first. the other light i saw was more in the eastern sky than the others and much higher in the sky. it was similar to the bright orange ball of light i first witnessed, but i only saw this slow moving light two or three times before it completely disappeared in the clouds. it too, disappeared much sooner than the first star-like object. when i saw the star-like objects i was not willing to immediately say they were craft other than airplanes. but because of their behavior i just described i came to the conclusion they were not planes.

at about 11:40 pm i had to go back inside the house to take care of a matter before midnight. 

then at around 11:55 pm i decided to go back outside to the road to see if there were anymore lights. i then saw what i would call some kind of craft flying from the north to the south. it passed by the western sky as it went its way, not directly above me. i could see a bright, white-yellow light on the front of the craft. on the back was a flashing white light. i could tell that there was some kind of structure between these lights. as i watched the craft, i could tell it was not a plane because of the slower speed it was moving at, and it made no noise. occasionally it seemed to almost slow to a stop. i then ran back inside to get my video camera.

when i came back out the object i was watching was more toward the south-west by then. i then started to film a craft that was quite similar to the previous craft. i could tell that it was not a plane because it showed basically the same behavior as the other craft (but it moved quicker more often). it actually slowed significantly then shot forward rapidly a short distance. i was standing in the road, so these were all over the horizon beyond the bean field.

i then noticed below this craft in the distance were two smaller lights. they were star-like, but they seemed to be orange. they were usually moving much too slow to be airplanes. you can see these in the attached video. in it, you can see that the larger craft gets dimmer and almost disappears from the camera���s view, (though i could still see it fine). you can also see three or more bright ground level lights, but can tell that they are at ground level as opposed to the crafts. at about three minutes into the video a car came down the road. i stepped off the road towards the bean field to continue filming. i then counted at least six lights in the sky that i could see. you cannot see them in the footage. i attempted to zoom in on the lights, but they were mostly too dim for the camera to pick up.

some time between this event and the one after this, i saw what i thought to be a plane. i thought i got in on film but i made some kind of mistake and do not believe that i did (it also did not seem to come in on the camera very good anyway). i thought it was probably a plane but it was moving much too slow, and it made virtually no noise. the sound it did make i would have to compare to the sound of a breeze blowing in your ear, though also it was something of a soft rumbling noise unlike that of an airplane (especially one that low). it looked triangular. at each of its three points was a bright white light. the front light and left-rear light were static. however, the right-rear light was flashing. the lights seemed to illuminate the bottom of the craft. if that is what i saw, i believe that it was black, but the parts most illuminated looked somewhat gray-ish due to the light. if i had been standing in the bean field, i believe that it would have been above my head. i later saw it south down the road over a corn field, joined by another craft that had come from the west.

at about 5 minutes into the film, i turn my attention down the road to the south. you can see a green-white spotlight that i believe someone down the road had put up on a telephone pole. to its left is a corn field and you can see a bright orange ufo. when it appears to be beneath the street light it is moving across the road (it is nowhere near the street light).

as i filmed this i noticed that all of the lights that were in the sky had been moving toward the south. i also saw another triangular craft that i thought might have been an airplane. by then i thought it should have been much farther away.

the light over the field that i just mentioned kept going back and forth from being over the field (i���m assuming it was over a field, but it was so far down the road it could have been over anything) and crossing over the road to the other side of the road, where it would disappear behind some trees. sometimes it would just reappear over the field. it often went from being dim, to shining like a bright orange fireball. it would usually shine brightly over the field as opposed to over the road. at one point it was bright over the road and just blinked out and disappeared. on the video, you can see it over the road going slowly toward the trees then suddenly jerk backwards and disappear. it did not usually appear to have a smooth flight path. often it was rather jerky. at one point i did see it rise higher in the sky, but i only saw it do this once.

in the video you can hear me remark that it sounds like there are people yelling about seeing the light. it turned out it was just my family wondering where i was.

at that point i ran back to the house to my family. i left the camera recording through that and so i have edited this out (i came back out around 12:33 or so). some of the events i described above could have happened after i came back out, but i do not remember clearly.

as i ran back to the house i turned around to see that the first light over the field was joined by a second, significantly higher in the sky.

i also saw more lights to the east as i watched these lights. they were some of the ones i noticed going toward the south (in the video, i mistakenly repeat that they were going north).

the one bright light over the field was occasionally joined by others. at one point, i saw two lights above the field. one (to the right) was higher than the other. they slowly moved towards each other, but they were too dim for the camera to pick up. i then turned on my camera���s ���night mode��� and they became visible to the camera. you can then see them flying away from each other toward the left (east) and right (west).

at one point, i saw a craft i had previously thought was a plane stop over the field and above one of the other lights, thus erasing any lingering doubts as to what it was.

eventually i decided to go back to the house because it was so late.

i have attempted to recount my experience the best i could. due to time, and watching the video, my memory may have gotten mixed up on a few details and i may have stated a few events out of order (especially toward the end). neither the video nor my retelling gives the event justice. in all, i believe i saw between 15 and 20 flying objects.

these events fit well within my worldview so i was not scared. i was amazed and sometimes in doubt as to what was going on, but never scared. i was happy i was able to witness such an amazing event.

the video was about 28 minutes long, but i have cut it to 15. i plan to put up all of my footage on youtube.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From 11:30 pm to 1:00 am i witnessed several different types of unidentified flying objects in the northern, eastern, and southern skies.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our deck looking at the beautiful blue sky when an object appeared from the south heading north. it was white, had a long triangular shape and absolutely no sound. we couldn't tell how high it was since we had never seen anything like it before my guess would be 10,000 to 20,000 ft. it moved smoothly and rapidly in a direct heading. i can't calculate the size of it because it seemed to be high in the sky. i can tell you right now that we watched this object and it left us both questioning what it could be.
content.summary: White long triangular shape

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2030, i went into my backyard to smoke a cigarette.  the skies were clear, and the evening was very cool.  i looked to the west, and thought i saw an aircraft at altitude, as it flashe red, blue, and white colored lights.  

the evening was quiet, but i could hear no sound.  further, the object didn't appear to be moving.  i changed my position to confirm that the "flashing" wasn't caused by leaves on a nearby tree and stood watching for several more minutes.

i then went to the door, and told my 13 year old son to put a jacket on, and come look at something, warning him not to look at any streetlights so as to preserve his night vision.

i pointed the object out to him, and asked him what he saw (so as not to "lead" him).  he first thought it was an airplane, but then also realized it wasn't moving.  he is studying astronomy in school, and suggested it might be a "nova".

we watched for a few minutes more, and i asked him to go and get our digital camera.

i attempted to take several pictures, but nothing was captured.

several more minutes of watching, and it never seemed to move, not even like a star would set.

it was cold, so we decided to go inside, and i would check it later.

about 30 minutes later, i went outside and could find no sign of it...Not even lower towards the horizon.  i plan to go back out tonight at the same time to look for it.
content.summary: Different colored flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: i was watching tv on monday, october 5, 2009 and turned on koce, a local station in huntington beach, ca and saw a picture of hitler with his arm up, giving a speech.  i thought it was frozen, so i changed the channel, and turned it back, and it was still there, with a clicking sound. the thing is, there were still news headlines moving at the bottom of the screen. the picture was there for 28 minutes, and i took a picture of it.  i just finished a book that described people in england in 1953 watching the bbc channel and they picked up a klee station from texas...That had gone off the air , three years before ???  so at 9:00 p.M. i went out for a smoke, and saw a distinct light cruising like a plane, and then....Jittered left, right, up, down, left, right fast.  then disappeared ??   i contacted the tv sation, and am still waiting for a response.  it was pretty trippy though.  does anyone know if that (hitler) image was one of the first images we broadcast into space when technology permitted ?   maybe it was a communication atempt ??  another object i saw in the sky (on another night) was red, and blinked slowly only twice...Next to a radio tower with a red blinking light on top.  was it possibly trying to send some sort of message to the red tower light ??
content.summary: Picture of hitler was frozen on local tv channel for 28 minutes. i went outside afterwards, and saw distinct fast moving light.  left, right,up, down, then disappeared ??

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo report
time 9pm new zealand time
two objects observed.
the first object was observed for 15 minutes over christchurch city.
i was standing outside having a coffee and a cigarette when i noticed a light streak across the sky from south to north then suddenly stop and hover then begin to move at high speed erratically across the sky. the first object appeared as a very bright point of light that would dim as it moved at high speed and at its lowest point it looked disk like.
i observed this object for over ten minutes as it made right angle turns and moved around at very high speeds. the second object appeared in much the same way as the first except from the east to west both began to move to follow each other at which point i lost sight of them as a bank of cloud rolled in and made observation impossible. this would put both objects at a very high altitude and by their movement and way of arrival i cannot see this as an aircraft. i did not notice any sound other than normal street traffic noise.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fast moving disk like object

content.detailedDescription: This was my one and only witnessing to a chain of mysterious sightings that lasted several weeks above the waters surrounding the st. petersburg peninsula 1998.  the highlight to this event ended with phone contact from the department of defense.  i was attending a party hosted at the oldest house built on the shores of boca ciega bay.  in a conversation at this gathering, friends and family members had been telling me about how they witnessed mysterious white lights on multiple occasions that appeared to shoot out of the water 1-3 miles off the coast of st. petersburg beach sometimes followed by high intensity explosions heard and seen as flashes of bright light.  i've always been fascinated with the possibility of seeing something bizzare happen in the night skies and i definetely got my chance that night shortly after listening to the stories, especially because this was an atypical ufo sighting.  later as the party was winding down i was relaxing on a swing chair on the rear house deck that faced the bay.  i was gazing at the night sky when suddenly there was an ultra bright blue or white flash immedialtely followed by a high-intensity, deafening report with a shockwave that nearly blew the windows out.  i remember people screamed and possibly a women crying it was so startling.  my cousin and brother instantly said "that's what we've been talking about!".  this was much louder than an exploding transformer or lightning hit.  i could feel the shockwave hit me like a bomb.  i ran down to the shoreline with a few others and saw a fireball and firey debris slowly falling from the sky which appeared to be over the south-eastern part of boca ciega bay or possibly furthur over the inlet of tampabay near the sunshine bridge.  it eventually burned out as it fell for about 15-20 seconds. i also remember thinking how the sound traveled so fast and that was an indicator of the distance of only about 1-2 miles from our location to the object.  my curiosity went on tangents to what it could have been.  the next morning i called the gulfport police dept to see if there had been any reports made or if anyone else had called it in and to my suprise, they said it had been a quiet night. none of the police officers supposedly witnessed anything either.  now my own theories at this point were that it was some marine based military activity being conducted by mac dill afb, such as missile tests or even submarine launched missiles but i didn't think that would be done in such close proximity to civilian areas.  the kicker to all this is that about an hour after i talked to the police dept, a secretary of defense called the house phone.  my mother answered the phone and told me that a secretary from the dept of defense was requesting to speak to me.  my heart skipped a beat and i took the phone.  a receptionist quickly briefed me to who i was going to be speaking with (wish i remembered the name) and what it entailed and asked if i would except the call.  i said "sure!".  i was a little scared but mostly excited.  i thought this meant something significant was going on.  the receptionist transferred the call and a man introduced himself and efficiently moved on to questions.  in a polite demeanor he said "what exactly did you see?".  i told him about the loud report(explosion noise) and the fireball and falling debris along with other details to location etc.  he said "yeah, we have been getting similar reports along most of the west coast of florida. we'll contact you again if we need to conduct furthur questioning and let you know what we find out. thankyou for the information".  the call was short and i found it uncanny that he would even disclose that little information to me about the sightings from others.  i drove to my buddy's house near tyrone square mall to tell him the news in person. approximately an hour later we saw armed sea cobra gunship helicopters flying a low formation over his house 500-1500' south towards boca ciega bay.  i don't know if that pertained to the sightings but i have never seen sea cobras in this area before especially since mac dill afb is home to a refueling wing of air tankers.  it's now fall 2009, i'm 33 y/o. i still wonder quite often about that event.  if anyone reading this has had a similar experience or has some insight i would be very interested in conversing with you.  thankyou for reading!  maildump@tampabay.Rr.Com
content.summary: Bright blue/white flash, ultra loud explosion, fiery debris slowly falling over bay

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my back porch in a very rural area little light pollution , and a very good view of the sky appox 80% the time was 8:05 pm est and as i watched the commercial airlines taking their usual routes i noticed a light maybe 5 times larger than a commercial jet but with the regular flights in the same area i could tell it was at a higher altitude. the speed was maybe 4 or 5 times faster than the regular planes and it took only 20 or so seconds to clear most of the sky. the object started speeding up and the flight path went up at about a 45 degree angle, the lights started getting smaller fast and then split into 2 lights in a y going northwest and northeast at an approximate angle of 30 degrees then in 2 seconds they sped off and disappeared. the light stayed bright white no flashing or different colors during the entire flight. when the object split into 2 the brightness  diminished as if the total mass was split and each carried half the illumination. sorry no time to get a camera and i doubt if a good picture would have resulted snyways it was too far away.

i was cooking a rather horrid meal at the time and stepped outside for a little air. never try deep fried corn on the cob. my wife daughter and i are all nite time sky watchers as we frequently stay up all night watching meteor showers and we have all had some very interesting sightings of anomolies in the nite skys. i was in a good state of mind it had been a long hot tiring week and had a chance to relax for several hours after work so i was mentally sharp at 8 pm and was eagerly awaiting the arrival of the wife and grandson whom is spending the weekend with us so a great mood was present.

i noticed the light right away and trained my eyes on it, i was looking for points of reference as i usually do to put things in perspective and followed it to it's disappearance. i am not an faa expert nor am i a pilot, but i am fair at judging relative height and comparing speed from a know to the unknown.
content.summary: Round light heading south to north higher then commercial flights faster sped up split into 2 and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: Walking in from hunting, up to my right a very fast moving large bright light shot past. completely silent, not very high either, and seemed to burn out. very odd. lots of planes in the sky at the time to compare this to. it was definitely noy a plane or any other man made object. not to say it couldn't have been an asteroid/comet. i reported it to the local police. they had heard nothing...Other than this was the day we crashed two probes into the moon. that isn't what i saw...Very weird.
content.summary: Very bright large light moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
i was at school in my last hour history class. the teacher told us to move our desks back. once, i was in my own desk again i looked out the window. the clouds were so beautiful, just like me to love the little things in life as simple as the clouds. then i notice a black dot moving across the sky. at first i thought it was the eagle i had seen the day before.
 i quickly realized that this was not the case. it didn't change coarse and had nothing i could discribe as wings. i will admit, i have made the mistake of misidentifying objects (never a plane) so ever since then when i've been identifying an object, i go down a list until a ufo is all it could be.
 it's not an eagle, is it a plane?
 just then in changed color- from black to siver! this surprised me, of coarse. it couldn't be a plane, unless it had changed angles slightly and reflected the sun different.
 then, it turned black again, then silver, and it repeated this about three or four times. then i noticed something else. some rather large flashes were occuring aroud it. they were far enough away from the object to say that they were different objects.
 soon, i noticed that it was angling downward and vanished beyond the distant trees. realizing that i wouldn't see anything else, i refocused to my teacher.
 i remained pretty calm during the entire expeariance (except for the fact that i wished i could jump out of my chair and yell, "what is that!?!). of, coarse, i'm pretty used to seing ufos, because i've seen them my entire life!
 also, i'm not sure if this had anything to do with it, but before i saw the ufo, it felt like my desk (it could have been just me) was shaking.
content.summary: A color-changing object with lights flashing around it.

content.detailedDescription: Decieded to go out side for a cig,hubby came out stood by the fence and said very excited come here and look at this,when i looked there were bright lights,following each other in the sky,quite low down and there was no noise,diddnt know what they were,was amazed when we seen them,both saying we never seen anything like it before,by the time we realized to get the camera most of them had dissapeared into the distance,why my husband was taking photos,i rang my friend round the corner to see if they could see them and they seen the last couple,before they dissapeared into the distance
content.summary: Between 30-50 spots

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving home on my lunch break.  while heading west at approx. 11:15 i looked up into a cloudless section of the sky and a metalic / reflective surface caught my attention.  i immediately thought of a plane until i realized that it was not moving, and had no markings.  i looked immediatly to my watch to memorize the time.  

i continued to observe the object for approx. 1 minute and it instantly disapeared.  i quickly scanned the sky to see if maybe it had turned and i some how missed it. there were no clouds in this section of the sky so what ever it was had completely disapeared.

i had to slow my vehicle down because the person in front of me appeared to be leaning over the steering wheel of his 2000-2001 (approx) toyota tundra to figure out where the object went as well.  he was point to the same section of sky to his passenger, after a few moments he sped back up to the speed limit of 45.  i cannot verify if the occupents were for sure looking at the same object, but as there was nothing else in that section of the sky it leads me to my conclusion.

i have never seen this type of ufo before.  but it appears to the the cigar shaped ufo that has been reported countless times.

i did not have any strange feelings or reactions upon seeing the object.
content.summary: Bright metallic cigar shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife came home @ 8:30 (oct. 7th) and sighted orange/gold cigar/disc off horizon from car before pulling into driveway over susqehanna river.  size approx. 200 yards in length @ 1 mile in distance from vantage point.

did not tell me till 9:45ish (said she didn't know how she forgot to tell me because she was in duress and very excited over sighting) told her mind control, ;-) kidding

saw 2 helicopters flying around area afterwards.

then, later i saw stretched bowtie shaped ufo around 2:30am (oct. 8th) track river from north to south for 2 miles then south to north west back 3 miles over the course of about 30 seconds.

ufo was whitish blue, long slender rectangle with bowtie ends.
ufo had red, blue, orange and green lights pulsing over surface, and not always in same location on surface of ufo.
i saw ufo through binoculars for about 10-15 seconds before it went behind treetops.

next morning helicopters and 4 a-10 warthogs we sighted in same area. (note: a-10's frequent area, but only in singles or pairs.)

please advise if there were any conclusive concurrent sightings please
content.summary: Sighted 2 different ufo's 1 @ 8:30pm and 1 different 1 @ 2:30am
